Guys, after doing some research, here are some very useful hints if you use Windows 7:

1) Install just the wey ServiusTheBear describes. Do EXACTLY the way he describes.

2) Before starting the game, do what user "xsaa" brought to us: copy the WHOLE content of the C:/whateverdiryouveinstalled/Dead Island/DI/out to C:/whateverdiryouveinstalled/Dead Island/out. Now you can save the game.

3) There has been some reports of sound failure. It happened to me. With a little research on google, i found out that all you need to do is run the file C:/whateverdiryouveinstalled/Dead Island/Redist/DirectX/DXSETUP.exe. Boom, the sound is working.

Important:

* Don't forget to run always as Administrator!
* Yes, you have to have Steam first of all! Just download it anywhere, it's free.
